definitions.title: n.m
definitions.body: .: Je 3:3 Pl. copious showers causing fertility;—´[[ר]]: De 32:2+ 3 t., [[רְבִבִים]] Je 14:22, [[רְבִבִם]] Je 3:3;—copious shower, Je 3:3 (+ [[מַלְקוֹשׁ]]) ´[[יִתְּנוּ ר]]: Je 14:22 (‖[[מַגְשִׁמִים ]]),´[[ר]]: Ps 65:11; sim.,of penetrating. pervasive infl. of prophetic words De 32:2 (‖[[שְׂעִירִם ]], also [[מָטָר]], [[טַל]] ), of Jacob Mic 5:6 (‖[[טַל ]]), of future king Ps 72:6 (‖[[מָטָר ]]).
